rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall that adheres to Vastu principles by aligning with the main entrance direction. Suitable for Mediterranean aesthetic using terracotta tiles and archways.
The central living area designed in a Mediterranean style with warm color palette, stone accents, and built-in seating areas. The layout is oriented for optimal sunlight exposure.
An integrated dining space adjacent to the living area that maximizes natural light and ventilation following local norms.
A Mediterranean-style kitchen with open layout, high-quality finishes, and a focus on energy efficiency. Considerations for proper Vastu placement are included.
The master bedroom positioned in the north-east corner for positive energy, featuring Mediterranean decor with built-in storage and a private balcony.
A secondary bedroom designed for balanced spatial flow, incorporating local building norms and natural light.
The third bedroom with sufficient space and ventilation. Designed to complement Mediterranean design elements.
A dedicated home theater area designed with soundproofing, ambient lighting, and comfortable seating, integrated within the living space while maintaining a clear separation from private zones.
An exclusive gym space featuring specialized flooring for exercise equipment, ample natural light, and built-in ventilation systems. Located in a less disturbed area of the apartment.

openings.description: The main entrance is oriented with respect to Vastu principles and Mediterranean style detailing.
Windows designed for maximum light penetration while maintaining privacy. Incorporates elements of local design norms.
Windows that provide natural light and ventilation in the dining area, adhering to Vastu guidelines.
